items.title: People think the rapture is coming and are sharing tips on how you can be ‘saved’
items.description: Pastor Joshua Mhlakela has warned that Jesus will return on September 23 ‘whether you are ready or not’.

items.title: Schoolchildren fall ill after eating falafel contaminated with human waste
How the ‘world’s smelliest fruit’ sparked a town centre’s gas leak emergency
items.description: An engineer tested a number of shops trying to find the source of the 'leak'

items.title: Bear attacks woman, 90, after wandering into shop during rampage in New Jersey
items.description: The bear's odd behaviour led to fears it may have been sick.

items.title: Fame-hungry influencers are renting £500,000 supercars they can’t even drive
items.description: Some influencers are so uninterested in driving the cars they haven't even started their engines, Starr Luxury Cars boss Ike Ordor said.
